summary: This mod add improved novice spells for Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master levels. All novice spells done, no DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KiOyLY7.png[/img]
 INS - Improved Novice Spells is an lore-friendly mod that aims to make novice spells strong enough to be used in higher levels. This mod won't change     any spell in the game and should be compatible with other mods. Enjoy your favorite novice spells now stronger!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/UWYyCrA.png[/img]

INS V1.0.1:
Bound Sword spells damage has been increased.
Bound Sword IV Master spell now cast a bound sword permanently.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HEhvrG1.png[/img]
 Note: By saying Skill Level I mean Perk Ranks such as, Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master.
 Note²: All Master spells are one hand cast only. If I get many requests I can make an optional patch to make it two hand cast 
like all Vanilla Master spells.
 Note³: All spells can be acquired by purchasing, like Vanilla spells eu need to met de requirements to "unlock" the spells to buy. 
Every time you met a requirement to unlock the spell and it isn't available to buy you need either: save, kill the vendor, load or wait 2 days.
This is necessary for the vendor to "reset" and load the new available items.
All spells are affected by its Magic Skill
[size=4]
The m[/size][size=4]od add the following spells:[/size]
[size=3] [/size][size=4]
 [color=#5b0f00]Destruction:[/color][/size]
[size=2]Every Destruction spell damage and magicka cost has been doubled for each Skill Level.[/size]
Vampiric Drain spell is not included because a lot of mods already change that spell and vampire stuff, so to increase 
mod compatiblity I choose to not improve it.

Flames I   - Apprentice
Flames II  - Adept
Flames III - Expert
Flames IV - Master

Frostbite I   - Apprentice
Frostbite II  - Adept
Frostbite III - Expert
Frostbite IV - Master

Sparks I   - Apprentice
Sparks II  - Adept
Sparks III - Expert
Sparks IV - Master
[color=#0c343d]
[/color][size=4][color=#0c343d] Conjuration:[/color]
[/size]Every Conjuration spell duration has been increased by 30 seconds for each Skill Level.
Bound Sword spells damage has been increased.
Conjure Familiar wolf level increased up to 30, health and damage are increased as well.
Conjure Familiar IV spell duration is permanent like Vanilla Thrall spells.
Raise Zombie spell is not included because it already has it's improved spells in Vanilla.

Conjure Familiar I   - Apprentice
Conjure Familiar II  - Adept
Conjure Familiar III - Expert
Conjure Familiar IV - Master

Bound Sword I   - Apprentice
Bound Sword II  - Adept
Bound Sword III - Expert
Bound Sword IV - Master

 [color=#783f04][size=4]Alteration:[/size][/color]
Candlelight spells has its light strength increased by 5 for each Skill Level. Duration increased by 30 for each Skill Level.
Equilibrium Health loss/magicka gain increased by 15 for each Skill Level.
Oakflesh spell is not included because it already has it's improved spells in Vanilla.

Candlelight I   - Apprentice
Candlelight II  - Adept
Candlelight III - Expert
Candlelight IV - Master

Equilibrium I   - Apprentice
Equilibrium II  - Adept
Equilibrium III - Expert
Equilibrium IV - Master

[size=4] [color=#20124d]Illusion:[/color]
[/size]Clairvoyance cost has been reduced by 5 for each Skill Level. Clairvoyance IV (Master) cost has been reduced to 0.
Courage health and stamina gain has been increased by 15 for each Skill Level.
Fury spell is not included because it already has it's improved spells in Vanilla.

Clairvoyance I   - Apprentice
Clairvoyance II  - Adept
Clairvoyance III - Expert
Clairvoyance IV - Master

Courage I   - Apprentice
Courage II  - Adept
Courage III - Expert
Courage IV - Master

[size=4] [color=#7f6000]Restoration:[/color]
[/size]Healing health regen. and cost is doubled for each Skill Level.
Lesser Ward spell is not included because it already has it's improved spells in Vanilla. 

Healing I   - Apprentice
Healing II  - Adept
Healing III - Expert
Healing IV - Master
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rUg5kfs.png[/img]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4374/?]Better Magic[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?]Better Vampires[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35339/?]Forgotten Magic[/url]

If you find any bug or incompatibility please tell me in the comment section. 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzOcdxn.png[/img]
[size=4]No DLC is required to run this mod.[/size] 
[size=4]
Manual Installation:
[/size] Locate the Data folder in your Skyrim installation directory and extract the contents of the downloaded file to your Data folder.
 Then open Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and enable INS - <Magic Skill>.bse

 [size=4]NMM Installation:[/size]
 [size=2]Open the downloaded file in NMM, install it and enable the INS - <Magic SKill>.bse in Plugins tab.
[/size] Or install it with NMM then open [url=https://boss-developers.github.io/]BOSS[/url] or [url=http://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url].

[size=4]Unninstall:
[/size]You can either disable the mod via NMM or disable the .bse file in Data Files - Skyrim Launcher.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ua9eHD6.png[/img]
author: Dragonyck
